page.title: 07ABERDEEN: RELIGION
page.content:
ABERDEEN: ST. MACHAR'S CATHEDRAL.
Near Seaton Park near Old Aberdeen stands an old building called St.Machars Cathedral. Due to old age the cathedral crumbled but it was restored and is still used as a church today.
Before going into the cathedral you pass through a graveyard where all types of people are buried. Through a door you will find the graves of Bishops of Aberdeen.
Inside the cathedral you will see the Coat-of-Arms on the roof. There are statues of important religious figures. Today tthe Cathedral is used for marrriages and the Sunday service is still held every week.
